quote: Do not associate with people who are unhappy and unlucky.
author: Baltasar Graci√°n

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote:
Act as if what you do makes a difference.
It does.
author: William James

quote: Civilization advances by extending the number of operations we can perform without thinking about them.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger & better than your current situation.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Do not waste time yourself in rejection, nor bark against the bad, but chant the beauty of the good.
author: Ralph Emerson

quote: Everything that exists is in a manner the seed of that which will be.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The first rule of compounding: Never interrupt it unnecessarily.
author: Charles Munger

quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
author: Carl Jung

quote: When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure.
author: Goodhart's Law

quote: Ex falso sequitur quodlibet (from what is false, any assertion validly follows).
author: Principle of Explosion

quote: Live a life worthwhile through learning.
author: Reminder to self
